experimentalArms.name: Experimental Arms
text: After the attack is resolved, that figure suffers +1 {DMG}.

preyUponDoubt.name: Prey Upon Doubt
text: When a figure is attacked, the Rebel figure chooses to either suffer 1 {STRAIN} or apply +1 {EVADE} to the defense results.

riotGrenades.name: Riot Grenades
text: All rebel heroes within 2 spaces of a figure in this group tests {INSIGHT}.{BREAK}

savageWeaponry.name: Savage Weaponry
text: Apply surge effect before all others.

showOfForce.name: Show of Force
text: When each figure declares an attack, they become focused.

surgicalStrike.name: Surgical Strike
text: After a figure attacks a target, the target suffers an additional 1 {STRAIN} and 1 {DMG}.

endlessRanks.name: Endless Ranks
text: When deploying a Trooper, reduce its deployment cost by 1.
After the attack is resolved, that figure suffers +1 {DMG}.
